msbt.message: Look who it is! Just in time for me to talk at you 'bout Reactions!Take shimmyin' around like this, for example<10_4 /> That was me tryin' to show some, whatchamacallitJoy. So did you buy that? Reckon you did, because Reactions work!So if you wanna let your carcass do the talkin', just press î‚§ and liven up your conversin' with some Reactions! There are a whole bunch, and I'd bet any islander'd be willin' to teach you a few of 'em, .

Ever had someone ask you, "Are you listenin' to me?" Uh-oh! Time for Reactions! That's when you do this sorta thing. "Oh yeah," you say. "Absolutely!" Didn't that look like I was listenin'?You can pretend to look interested just by bobbin' your head up and down. Agreement can save yer butt!

Oh, hey there, . You know what burns my beans?When somebody's got troubles, but don't show any Reaction, and they expect ME to pick up on it!So, if something's worryin' you, make sure you make that Worry plain on your face! Help me out!

Y'ever been asked somethin', but you don't have an answer? I hate when that happens Here's what I do. I just smirk, real sarcastic-like, and wait until things get awkward and they wander off. Smart, right? Sometimes all you need is some Sheepishness, and everything'll just work itself out. Reactions can getcha out of jams!

Oh, hey, kiddo. I got one humdinger of a Reaction to share with you!Like that one? You caught it, right?<10_4 /> I use Bewilderment to spread a bit of mustard on whatever I'm sayin'.Reactions can really help if you wanna make an impression!

I'm in a good mood just now, so I think I might share a Reaction of mine that's a particular favorite.Say you get a flash of InspirationOh yeah I got some good ideas.<10_4 /> So, whaddaya think? Like that one? It's an oldie, but a goodie. Try it out!
